JobFullDesc: Are you interested in working in a dynamic environment that offers opportunities for professional growth and new responsibilities? Are you interested in helping clients drive alignment with their business, improve organizational and human resource performance and establish a culture focused on adding business value? That is what the new generation of human resource transformation is all about. If you are seeking a role that offers you the opportunity to advise Government and Public Services (GPS) clients through critical and complex issues, while allowing you to develop personally and professionally, consider a career in Deloitte's Human Capital practice.   Work you'll do  As an Functional HCM Senior Consultant within our Human Capital team you will:  Organize and deliver services on a cross-section of projects  Apply your experience from having worked on at least 1-2 public sector projects to serve as an experienced resource on the HCM configurations, assisting in system strategy, gathering and documenting business requirements, leading fit gap analysis, as-is & to-be business process designs, prototype demonstration, functional configuration, testing and client user training  Work with team members and supports delivery teams and staff  Give presentations to clients or other decision makers in order to sell ideas to various audiences (technical and non-technical)  Participate in Pre-sales, proposal, and RFP initiatives The team  Deloitte's Government and Public Services (GPS) practice - our people, ideas, technology and outcomes-is designed for impact. Serving federal, state, & local government clients as well as public higher education institutions, our team of over 15,000+ professionals brings fresh perspective to help clients anticipate disruption, reimagine the possible, and fulfill their mission promise. The HR Transformation offering (HRT) transforms the way HR enables the business and the workforce. In this world of disruption, we believe that HR has an opportunity to take the lead and own enterprise-wide issues for the organization. From the creation of HR strategy using our leading Oracle-enabled HR Transformation labs, the application of design thinking that allows HR to challenge how work gets done today, to navigating the ever-evolving HR technology landscape to determine the right digital solutions to enable transformation, our HR Transformation practice is focused on helping HR take the lead.  Qualifications  Required:  Bachelor's Degree  5 years of relevant HCM consulting or industry experience  1 year of experience as a functional or workstream lead  Has completed at least 1 full life-cycle HCM configuration (e..g PeopleSoft HCM, Oracle HCM Cloud, etc.)  Travel up to 80% (While 80% of travel is a requirement of the role, due to COVID-19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice.)  Must be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship, now or at any time in the future Preferred: Prior big 4 consulting experiencePMP Certification
